## Major Release - NYA Core 3.0

### New Features
- Flexible run types with custom autosplit triggers (AND/OR logic)
- Kill count tracking for bonfire ascetic runs (DS2)
- Target time goals per split
- Twitch stream metadata auto-update when loading presets
- Missing plugin detection with download prompts
- Vision-based autosplitter for console games
- Testers section in About page

### Improvements
- Complete i18n coverage (200+ new translation keys)
- Config-driven autosplitter pattern loading from plugins
- Externalized memory patterns to plugin files
- Comprehensive rest points and known_flags for all games

### Bug Fixes
- Fix preset name not restoring on app restart
- Fix autosplitter not restarting when switching games
- Fix visual bugs in counter tab
- Fix OBS overlay CSS component switching
- Add serde defaults for TwitchConfig backwards compatibility
